response.overview: ‘3X2X1’ presents three individuals taking turns on a podium, never occupying the frame simultaneously. The film is built on the tension between repetition and variation, exploring the mechanics of cinema as a language that is never given in its entirety. The device transforms the montage into a system of alternation, in which continuity does not arise from the juxtaposition of images, but from the transition between the viewer and the watched.  Shot in maka.lab (Milan) during the summer of 2024.
response.title: 3x2x1
